name: Blink Video Doorbell (newest model) – Head-to-toe HD view, two-year battery life, and simple setup. Sync Module Core included – System (Black)
short_description: Video Doorbell is our second-generation smart security doorbell with up to two years of battery life, an expanded field of view, and improved security features for more peace of mind, no matter where you are.
Last longer with two-year battery life — Experience up to two years of continuous security coverage with three AA Energizer lithium batteries and a Blink Sync Module (both included).
See more at your door — Greet guests and watch packages get delivered, day and night, with head-to-toe HD view and infrared night vision. Use two-way talk to hear and speak through the Blink app.

Set up in minutes — Easily install wire-free or connect Video Doorbell to existing doorbell wiring. When wired, Video Doorbell will sound through your home. Without wiring, you can use your Blink Mini 2 camera (sold separately) as an indoor plug-in chime. You'll also get alerts on your Blink app with each doorbell press.

Always know who's there — As part of a Blink Subscription Plan (sold separately), get alerts whenever a person is detected and enjoy features like Blink Moments, which stitches together clips into a single video to save and share.
Save and share clips — Securely store your footage in the cloud with a free 30-day trial of a Blink Subscription Plan (sold separately).
Works with Alexa — Connect to an Alexa-enabled device to answer the front door, arm and disarm your smart home system, and more using your voice.

Includes one Video Doorbell with three AA Energizer lithium batteries, one Sync Module Core with one USB-C cable and indoor power adapter, a mounting kit (including screws and anchors), and a corner mount.

name: Smart 1080P Video Doorbell Camera Wireless, AI Human Detection, Live View, 2-Way Audio, Included Chime, Night Vision, 2.4G Wi-Fi, Cloud Storage, Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance Cam (White)
short_description: AI-Enhanced Human Recognition: Superior AI capabilities discern humans from other moving objects like vehicles or foliage.

Protected Cloud Storage: Enjoy enhanced security and flexibility with Secure Cloud Storage, featuring AES-128 encryption to safeguard your data. Experience protected cloud storage for uninterrupted recording and easy reviewing.
Live Two-Way Interactions: Conveniently converse with visitors in real-time, from anywhere.
Enhanced Night Vision: Four IR LEDs paired with a smart infrared sensor produce sharp videos, ensuring visibility in dim settings.
Durable Weather Resistance: With IP65 dustproof and waterproof certification, this video doorbell withstands various weather conditions, providing consistent security throughout the year.

name: TP-Link Tapo Smart Video Doorbell Camera Wireless with Chime, 2K with Full Color Night Vison & Spotlights, No Monthly Fee, Ring Call, 160° Ultra-Wide View, Free AI Detection, Local Storage (D210)
short_description: 【2K Resolution】Details matter. Equipped with 2K resolution, see beyond traditional 1080p resolution with finer details and incredible clarity. Easily identify faces capturing every detail even when zooming in, showing you everything you need to see at your entrance. Connects via 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Band

【160° Diagonal FOV, Head-to-toe view】See the full picture with a 160° ultra-wide head-to-toe field of view. See items that traditional video doorbells may miss ensuring comprehensive coverage of your entryway.

【Ring Call – Never Miss a Visitor】Receive a phone call to answer your door without opening up the Tapo app. Quickly answer visitors with once-click convenience. Stay connected, stay informed, and never miss a visitor again. (Calls are generated via app and will not use cellular minutes)

【Prioritize What Matters】Eliminate unnecessary notifications by defining activity zones specifically monitoring for motion or people. Receive real-time alerts for true security concerns with 𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻 𝗗𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, eliminating false detection from other objects.

【Secure Storage No Subscription Required】Save recorded footage on a microSD card (up to 512GB, not included) or subscribe to Tapo Care for cloud storage which saves 30-days of video history. Your privacy is our priority when it comes to storing and transmitting sensitive information such as your camera videos and identity information. To ensure robust data security, Tapo implements AES 128-bit encryption and TLS 1.2 encryption protocols. (𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗱: 𝗖𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘀 𝟭𝟬, 𝗨𝗛𝟭, 𝗲𝗻𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗺𝗶𝗰𝗿𝗼𝗦𝗗 𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗱𝘀 𝗼𝗿 𝗵𝗶𝗴𝗵𝗲𝗿)

【Long Lasting Battery】The rechargeable 6400mAh battery greatly extends usage between charges, ensuring continuous operation and less charging. This long-lasting battery gives you the flexibility to place the doorbell anywhere you need.

【Full Color Night Vision with Spotlight】The Tapo Smart Doorbell provides added security 24/7. The included spotlight activates when motion is detected (brightness can be adjusted) for added deterrence. The spotlight also allows for full color night vision ensuring enhanced visibility and better security even in low-light conditions.

【Two-Way Audio & Quick Response Prompts】Clear and efficient communications are made possible with built in two-way audio. For even greater convenience, select from a list of preset quick responses to respond quickly to those at the door.
【Works with Alexa and Google】Use your favorite screen assistant like Alexa and Google with the D210 doorbell camera to view and answer those at your door.

【Included Angled Wedge for Flexible Mounting】The included 15° horizontal wedge provides additional flexibility when mounting the camera. Ideal for doorbell placements perpendicular to entrances, the wedge provides a more optimal viewing angle.
product_description: Introducing the Tapo D210: Transform your doorbell experience with this smart video doorbell, featuring a powerful 6400mAh rechargeable battery. Choose battery mode for added flexibility. Capture every moment in stunning 2K resolution, day or night, with a 160° DFOV wide-view design and built-in spotlights ensuring no detail is missed. Enjoy seamless, hands-free home control with Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility. *𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗿𝘀: 1. microSD card sold separately. Actual storage capacity depends on the size of the microSD card used. 2. Cloud storage service available via Tapo Care subscription 3. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant-supported displays. User experience varies based on connected services. 4. Chime is for indoor use only. 5. Battery life depends on recording time, live view usage, device settings, router specifications, and environmental factors.

name: AOSU Doorbell Camera Wireless- Head-to-Toe View, Intelligent Package Detection, 2.4G WiFi Video Doorbell with Chime, Support Local Storage, Smart Human Detection, Works with Alexa and Google Assistant
short_description: Head-to-Toe Video: With a 170° ultra wide angle and 9:16 vertical view, the AOSU doorbell camera provides a complete view of your doorstep, from head to toe. Never miss a visitor or package again.
Protect Your Packages Without Subscription: The doorbell camera automatically detects packages at your door and sends you an instant alert. Rest assured that your deliveries are safe and secure.

Too Many Invalid Alerts? - Advanced human detection technology minimizes false alerts by focusing on detecting people, not animals or shadows. Receive timely notifications with clear pictures of actual visitors.
2K Full HD Clarity: Experience stunning 2K Full HD video that captures every detail. See who's at your door and what they're doing with exceptional clarity.

Quick Reply and Voice Changer: When you are busy, use the preset quick voice reply of the doorbell camera to the visitor. You can also use a voice changer to protect your privacy or scare off people with bad intentions.
Remote Control and Two-Way Voice: Communicate with visitors from anywhere using the AOSU doorbell camera's two-way voice function. Stay connected and in control of your home security.
Seamless Smart Home Integration: Connect the doorbell camera with Alexa or Google Assistant for hands-free control and real-time alerts. Enhance your home security ecosystem with ease.

Invest in Peace of Mind: The AOSU doorbell camera is the ultimate solution for comprehensive home security and convenience. Protect your family, packages, and property with confidence. Order yours today and experience the difference!
Connect the included chime so you can hear notifications when you are far away from the doorbell (only supported when connected with the included doorbell)
Note: The product will have a blue light ring during normal operation, and the product will automatically record event videos，please note that this product is only applicable to 2.4G Wi-Fi.

name: Arlo Video Doorbell 2K | 2nd Gen | Wire-Free/Wired Option, 2-Way Audio, Night Vision, Head to Toe Video View, Integrated Siren | Live Stream | Real Time Notifications |180 Deg Wide View, White
short_description: Reliable Indoor & Outdoor Video Doorbell Wired/Wireless: Watch, listen and talk. Monitor your home, property and keep your loved ones safe with 2K video quality. A video doorbell home monitoring system that is IP65 weather resistant.

Arlo protects your everything. Including your privacy: At Arlo, we are as passionate about privacy as we are about safeguarding your home & family. Arlo is designed to keep your personal information private and in your control.

Don’t miss a moment with the Arlo App: Get real-time notifications with motion activation & live video streaming in the Arlo app. Includes remote siren activation, night vision, built-in camera spotlight & large field of view (180 degrees).

Get more with an Arlo Secure plan (paid plan required): Share & store video for up to 60 days, know more with personalized alerts for Person & Vehicle Recognition, plus get alerts for Packages, Animals, and Fire Detection.¹

Expert support at your fingertips: Access help through the Arlo app and connect with our community to learn and share. 24/7 chat support available via app or website. Product use & support for United States only.
Simple Wi-Fi Setup: Setup your camera(s) using 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connectivity. If you have a 5GHz network your router is most likely dual-band and will have a 2.4GHz network running too.

Accessories/Compatibility: Video Doorbell, 1 indoor USB charging cable, wire extension kit, flat mounting plate, angled mounting plate, security latch release pin, screw kit & quick start guide. Compatible with Chime 2, Security Tags & Security Cameras.
product_description: Elevate your home security with Arlo's 2nd Generation Video Doorbell, a state-of-the-art wireless doorbell camera with multiple powering options is designed to bring you peace of mind. The advanced security camera system captures detail with 2K resolution. Its expansive 180-Degree Field of Vision with a head-to-toe view broadens your front door surveillance, leaving no corner unmonitored. Night or day, the Arlo Video Doorbell stands guard. Equipped with cutting-edge Night Vision, this doorbell ensures your home security remains vigilant through the darkest hours. The app-enabled wireless video doorbell connects directly to your Wi-Fi network, facilitating real-time alerts and live-streaming video feeds on your smartphone or tablet. Enhanced with 2-Way Audio, this device also allows you to communicate with visitors or ward off unwanted guests. Installation of this sleek video doorbell camera is a breeze, offering a seamless addition to your home security system. The included Arlo Secure Plan trial provides a robust suite of premium features, including 60-Day Video Cloud Storage and the ability to distinguish between people, packages, and vehicles. With its Integrated Siren, this wireless video doorbell doesn't just record security breaches; it actively helps prevent them, making it an indispensable component of your home's defense. Arlo builds trusted, lifelong customer relationships by creating innovative, smart security solutions that deliver an exceptional user experience. The Arlo Secure App offers an intuitive way to control your home security with industry-leading features that help you take quick action. Disclaimer: ¹Requires an Arlo Secure paid subscription after the trial period, and some Arlo Secure services may be unavailable in certain regions. For current information on features that need a paid subscription, visit arlo.com/arlosecure. ²Program not available in certain countries. Device(s) must be connect to paid Arlo paid plans to qualify. ³Requires an Arlo Home Security System and Arlo Cellular and Battery Backup accessory (sold separately). Battery backup duration will vary with device settings, use, and environmental factors.⁴Requires an Arlo Home Security System. Discounts may vary by insurance provider.

name: Doorbell Camera Wireless, Head-to-Toe Video, 2K HD Live View, Two-Way Talk,Smart Video Doorbell with Chime,no Subscription,Battery Powered,Motion Detection &Alerts,Works with Alexa &Google(2.4G WiFi)
short_description: 🔍 See Everything, Miss Nothing - 180° Full-Body View No more guessing who's at the door. KAMEP doorbell camera 180° ultra-wide lens captures visitors head-to-toe AND packages on your doorstep in a single frame – no blind spots. Perfect for guarding deliveries (hello, porch pirates!) and identifying strangers. *FYI: Works with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi only (5GHz not supported).*

🌙 2K HD Clarity Day or Night – Spot a Face, Read a License Plate Crisp 2K resolution of wireless doorbell camera lets you zoom in on details like facial features or license plates. After dark 33ft infrared night vision keeps watch like a security guard – even in pitch-black darkness.

🚨 Smart Human Detection with Customizable Alerts KAMEP video doorbell with advanced PIR motion detection focuses specifically on human movement, reducing false alarms from pets or shadows by 90%. Customize detection zones and sensitivity levels through the app to only receive alerts for important activity.

📞 Talk Anonymously or Pre-Set Replies – "Leave the Package, Thanks!" Two-way audio of wireless doorbell lets you confront strangers safely – use the voice changer to disguise your voice. Too busy? Auto-reply with pre-set commands like "We’ll grab the package later!" (No awkward small talk required.)

🔒 No Monthly Fees + Alexa/Google Ready – Your Data, Your Rules Choose free lifetime cloud storage (basic 6S/7day loop ) or pop in a 128GB TF memory card (not included). Works with Alexa/Google for voice commands like "Show me the front door." Military-grade encryption + IP66 waterproof = built to last through storms.
⚡ Rechargeble Battery – Set It & Forget It Get 1-2 months per charge (app alerts you at 20%). No constant recharging – spend time on what matters.
🛠️ Install in 5 Mins – No Drilling, No Thieves Rent-friendly? Use adhesive pads. Want anti-theft? The steel bracket screws into door frames. Survives blizzards, downpours, and 100°F summers.

name: BOIFUN 2K HD Wireless Doorbell Camera – No Subscription Required, 166° Wide View, Quick Wake‑Up & Motion Detection, HDR Night Vision, Two‑Way Audio, 6700 mAh Battery, Chime, 2.4 GHz Wi‑Fi Only
short_description: 166° Wide Angle & f/2.5 Aperture: The 𝟏𝟔𝟔° wide-angle field of view covers the area in front of the door. The f/2.5 aperture and CMOS sensor ensure moderate depth of field, providing background blur and clear details.
Intercom, Front Door Bell & Security Camera: It can be monitored in real time via the "BoifunCam" APP without opening the door, which is safe and convenient. (𝐍𝐨 𝐒𝐮𝐛𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧)

HDR Night Vision, Invisible Monitoring Without Red Light: HDR technology and AI chips manage complex lighting, with a high-sensitivity sensor for clear images even in backlight. The 940nm infrared fill light enables 𝟏𝟎-𝐦𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 without red exposure, automatically switching day/night modes for all-weather protection.
Easy Installation & Forced Removal Alarm: 𝐖𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 Easy to install and with anti-theft alarm for complete security.

Ultra-Fast,Stable Response for Enhanced Security: 𝐎𝐧𝐥𝐲 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝟐.𝟒𝐆 𝐖𝐢𝐟𝐢 - Powered by a 1.2T AI chip and 128MB DDR memory, delivers 𝐟𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫 and more 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 response, processing 12,000 billion operations/s.

Comes with a Large-volume 𝐂𝐡𝐢𝐦𝐞: Volume level 4, the maximum volume can reach 100 decibels, which can be heard when sleeping in the bedroom or cooking in the kitchen. (Of course, you can also set "Do not disturb")

name: 1080p Wireless Video Doorbell Camera with Doorbell Receiver, Color Night Vision, 2-Way Talk, AI Human Detection and Instant Alerts, 2.4G WiFi, Cloud Storage Service, Battery Powered
short_description: Doorbell Receiver Placement Where You Need It: Install the doorbell receiver in multiple rooms to never miss a visitor or delivery.
Color Night Vision that Sees it All: From dawn till dusk, capture every detail clearly, even in complete darkness.
Intelligent Alerts Powered by AI: Get notifications only when people are detected – no more distractions from pets or cars.
Wide-Angle Lens for Comprehensive Monitoring: Watch every inch of your entryway with an ultra-wide lens.
Two-Way Talk at Your Fingertips: Speak with visitors from anywhere using two-way audio on your phone.

name: AOSU Doorbell Camera Wireless, 5MP Ultra HD, No Monthly Fee, 2.4/5 GHz WiFi Video Doorbell with Homebase, Battery/Wired Powered, Work with Alexa & Google Assistant
short_description: 5MP UHD, 40% Improved From 2k: Adopted 7 pieces of an advanced ultra-clear optical glass lens ensures you get sharp, detailed images even in low-light or bright conditions.

Triple Motion Detection, No False Alerts: Advanced radar and PIR motion sensors and intelligent human detection can distinguish between near and far objects' track, and judge whether they are people or animals.
60 Days Loop Recording: Stored videos directly to your HomeBase with built-in 8G memory and view them anytime anywhere, no monthly fee.
180 Days From 1 Charge: Built-in rechargeable battery and 58% consumption reduced low-power wireless connection, ensure 180 days of flawless front door coverage from 1 charge.
166° Field of View: You could see a person from head to toe or a package on the ground, there are no blind spots.

name: Smart Video Doorbell Camera Wireless, AI Human Detection and Instant Alerts, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Battery Powered, Cloud Storage Sold Seperately, 2.4G WiFi (Chime Included)
short_description: Interactive Audio Communication: Facilitates direct two-way conversation with visitors from anywhere.

Optional AES 128-bit Encrypted Cloud Storage: To securely store, replay, and share your videos, you must subscribe to cloud storage. This service requires an annual fee and can be purchased separately through the app.
Advanced Al Human Recognition: Utilizes artificial intelligence to distinguish between humans and other moving objects, like cars and pets.
Superior Night Vision: With infrared lights paired with a smart sensor, our camera promises exceptional video quality, even in dim lighting, ensuring round-the-clock safety.
Shared camera Access for Collaborative Safety: Allow family members to access thecamera for a unified approach to home monitoring, keeping everyone informed and secure.

Only Supports 2.4GHz Wi-Fi: This doorbell camera works only with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi for fast and reliable connections. It does not support 5GHz Wi-Fi, so be sure to connect to a 2.4GHz network for the best performance.
